alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:07PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Bernard, southeastern St. Charles, east central Terrebonne, eastern Lafourche, central Jefferson and Plaquemines Parishes through 900 PM CDT... At 807 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cut Off to 10 miles north of Buras-triumph. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Galliano, Larose, Port Sulphur, Belle Chasse, Golden Meadow, Jean Lafitte, Boothville-venice, Lafitte, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Port Fourchon, Buras-triumph, Venice, Myrtle Grove, Pointe A La Hache, Barataria, Leeville and Boothville Asos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Plaquemines
